channel.title: Game Over on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Game Over on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Gamers Are Furious About the Censorship of NSFW Games—and They’re Fighting Back
item.description: As industry groups decry censorship, players are flooding Visa and Mastercard with complaints and sharing the titles of delisted NSFW games to support developers.

item.title: Gamers Are Furious About the Censorship of NSFW Games—and They’re Fighting Back
item.description: As industry groups decry censorship, players are flooding Visa and Mastercard with complaints and sharing the titles of delisted NSFW games to support developers.

item.title: Italian YouTuber Faces Jail Time for Showing Android Handhelds With Emulated Games
item.description: The games on the devices shown by the content creator may not be entirely legal. That was enough for Italian law enforcement to ding him for “promotion of pirated copyrighted materials.”
